function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to new regulations (e.g. wearing masks in public) leading to increased spread of the disease.","Impact":"Higher transmission of contagious diseases and potential resurgence of outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Education and enforcement of regulations, public awareness campaigns, and community engagement.","Technologies":"Digital tools for public communication and enforcement (e.g. mobile apps for tracking and reporting compliance).","People":"General public, business employees, and customers.","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, businesses."},{"Description":"Severe loss of demand and revenues in non-essential services such as entertainment and tourism.","Impact":"Economic hardship for businesses, potential closure, and loss of jobs.","Mitigation":"Diversification of services, investment in digital platforms, and targeted marketing strategies.","Technologies":"Online booking and reservation systems, virtual event platforms, and digital advertising tools.","People":"Business owners, employees in affected industries, and local communities.","Owner":"Business owners, industry associations, and local government."},{"Description":"Limited access to financial aid and resources for SMEs, especially in skill development and training.","Impact":"Inability to build critical capabilities, lower resilience, and limited recovery from economic downturns.","Mitigation":"Government grants and subsidies for skill development, public-private partnerships for training programs, and financial support for SMEs.","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual training tools, and digital skill development resources.","People":"SME owners, employees, and industry trainers.","Owner":"Government, industry associations, and business support organizations."}]}
